siteName: AWS Gen AI for Software Development
siteTagline: Innovation in Software Development with AWS Generative AI

hero.title: AI-Powered Software Development using AWS generative AI
hero.subtitle: Championing Development Excellence with AI-Powered Solutions

features.title: End-to-End SDLC Acceleration
features.description: Accelerate innovation cycles through AI-assisted development, reducing time-to-market by automating routine tasks while enabling developers to focus on strategic, high-value creative work.

features.title: Quality and Reliability
features.description: Enhance software quality and reliability by leveraging AI for automated testing, real-time code analysis, predictive issue detection, and continuous security vulnerability monitoring.

features.title: Boost team productivity
features.description: Boost team productivity and satisfaction with AI-powered collaboration tools, knowledge management, and contextual assistance that democratizes expertise across your entire development organization.

howItWorks.title: How the Platform Works
howItWorks.description: Accelerating development through AWS generative AI solutions and enterprise tool integration

personas.title: Developer
personas.description: Drives application modernization through systematic code migration from Java 8 through 21, optimizing performance with new language features like virtual threads and pattern matching, while maintaining robust testing and deployment practices

personas.title: Project Manager
personas.description: Translates business requirements into well-structured epics and user stories, breaking down complex initiatives into manageable development tasks while ensuring alignment with project goals

personas.title: Solutions Architect
personas.description: Comprehensive solutions through infrastructure-as-code implementations, optimizing costs while maintaining detailed technical documentation that bridges business needs with architectural decisions and best practices

personas.title: Business Analyst
personas.description: Translates customer voices into actionable strategies by mapping feedback to both immediate fixes and long-term improvements, prioritizing solutions based on customer value and implementation complexity to maximize business impact

personas.title: Ops Engineer
personas.description: Drives continuous improvement by implementing validated solutions, automating fixes, and maintaining a comprehensive knowledge base to enhance system reliability and reduce incident recurrence

aboutPage.title: About the Platform
aboutPage.content: We champion software development excellence by harnessing the power of Generative AI across your entire development lifecycle. Our platform seamlessly integrates with your enterprise tools and systems, empowering teams to accelerate innovation and transform ideas into solutions with unprecedented speed. We're obsessed with developer success, delivering intelligent automation and workflow optimization that helps teams build better software faster while maintaining operational excellence.
